doc.field: News release: Remarks by H.E. Ambassador Clovis Maksoud, permanent observer of the League of Arab States to the United Nations and Special Envoy to the United States, at a luncheon for the deported mayors of Hebron and Halhul and the Moslem judge of Hebron, on May 19, 1980
